body:
i'm thankful i had a good day yesterday and that today is friday and i'm feeling good again.

i'm thankful for _the circle_, which continues to deliver so much joy (and makes me think about the weirdness of working from home and rarely ever leaving my house!) and i'm thankful that we rewatched the episode of _the office_ which is about michael spreading the rumor that stanley is cheating on his wife teri with his former nurse cynthia and then getting chastened and spreading false gossip about others to cover it up and seemingly having cleared it up but then getting a call at the end of the episode from teri and preparing himself not to say anything wrong and there's this huge buildup of tension and then he picks up the phone and immediately blurts "[hey what up, cynthia](https://getyarn.io/yarn-clip/6ad8c6c1-bd07-49cd-abf2-f6143b1e23fc)" which just made me laugh so hard.

i'm thankful to continue replaying elizabeth warren's eviscerations of bloomberg.

i'm thankful for [this video of a camera falling from an airplane](https://twitter.com/iatemuggles/status/1229410593305776129), which reminds me of nam june paik, the way that there's this fascinating dynamic color field abstraction produced by the camera being spun so fast.

i'm thankful it's been sunny and not very rainy in portland this week! i'm thankful every time i bring miso in from outside and touch her paw to see if it's wet and it's not wet so we don't have to go through the paw drying ritual she despises.

i'm thankful for [this incredibly true meme](https://twitter.com/aherman2006/status/1229208097232691201).

i'm thankful that though i had put off peeling the pumelo that has been sitting in the fruit bowl for a couple weeks, i finally peeled it last night while watching _the circle_ and then gorged on the entire thing in one sitting, which i did not need to do but was satisfying.
